# ino-carousel-slide

An image that is shown in the `<ino-carousel>` component. Should only be used in conjunction with it.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                       | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `selected` | `selected` | Selected state controlled by the `<ino-carousel>` | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `src`      | `src`      | Link to the image                                 | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`    | Value of the slide                                | `string`  | `undefined` |
